characters.name: Muflus
tips: LEAP into your opponents and unleash your fury!
CRUSH adversaries with the relentless power of your saw!
RAMPAGE into the action as enemies flee in desperation!
Outsmart opponents by leaping to unexpected hideouts.
Pro Tip: Use the MAGIC BOOTS to combine strength and agility.

characters.name: H4CK
tips: Use your SLINGSHOT and strike up to 3 enemies at once!
Your enemy is hiding behind a wall? No worries, use your Ulti and make it rain!
Stuck in a bad place? FLASH out before they catch you!
Use your speed and don't let anyone hit you.
Pro Tip: Take advantage of your slingshot and fight from a safe distance.

characters.name: Uma
tips: With three knife stabs, AVENGE your kind!
Channel your VEIL OF RADIANCE and vanish into the shadows!
SNEAK into opponents when they least expect you!
Use well your invisibility: any action you make will bring you back to light.
Pro Tip: Approach a weak opponent while invisible and stab him before he even sees you.

characters.name: Valtimer
tips: Release ANTIMATTER and blast your enemies!
Spawn a black hole and trap your enemies!
Open a portal and WARP away!
Teleport through a wall and leave your opponents hanging.
Pro Tip: Aim your ANTIMATTER into a black hole you spawned and unleash its full strength.
